Description_lang: Your Thrash (Bear) and Lacerate abilities deal $s1% additional damage and the cost of your Rip ability is reduced by $s3 energy.

name_blz.pt_BR: Item - Bônus 2P Feral de Druida T10

description_blz.en_US: Your Thrash (Bear) and Lacerate abilities deal 20% additional damage and the cost of your Rip ability is reduced by 10 energy.
description_blz.es_MX: Tus facultades Vapulear (oso) y Lacerar infligen un 20% de daño extra, y el costo de tu facultad Destripar se reduce en 10 p. de energía.
description_blz.pt_BR: Suas habilidades Surra (Urso) e Lacerar causam 20% a mais de dano e o custo de energia da sua habilidade Rasgar é reduzido em 10.
description_blz.de_DE: Der durch Eure Fähigkeiten 'Hauen (Bär)' und 'Aufschlitzen' verursachte Schaden wird um 20% erhöht, und die Kosten Eurer Fähigkeit 'Zerfetzen' werden um 10 Energie verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Your Thrash (Bear) and Lacerate abilities deal 20% additional damage and the cost of your Rip ability is reduced by 10 energy.
description_blz.es_ES: Tus facultades Vapulear (oso) y Lacerar infligen un 20% más de daño y el coste de tu facultad Destripar se reduce 10 p. de energía.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente les dégâts de vos techniques Rosser (ours) et Lacérer de 20% et réduit le coût en énergie de votre technique Déchirure de 10 points.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Falciata (Orso) e Lacerazione del 20% e riduce il costo in energia di Squarcio di 10.
description_blz.ru_RU: Способности "Взбучка" (облик медведя) и "Растерзать" наносят на 20% больше урона, а затраты энергии на способность "Разорвать" снижаются на 10 ед.
description_blz.ko_KR: 난타 (곰), 가르기의 공격력이 20%만큼 증가하고, 도려내기에 소모되는 기력이 10만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你痛擊(熊形態)與割裂技能造成的傷害提高20%，撕扯的能量消耗減少10點。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的痛击（熊形态）和割伤技能可造成20%的额外伤害，并使你割裂技能所消耗的能量值降低10点。
